remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 您必須等到 HTML 文件已完成載入以便將事件處理常式附加至文件。You must wait until an HTML document has finished loading in order to attach an event handler to the document. 如果您嘗試載入已經完成之前附加的處理常式，在附加作業可能會失敗。If you attempt to attach a handler before loading has completed, the attach operation may fail. 附加事件處理常式，在新的文件的最佳位置是在事件處理常式控制項。The best place to attach event handlers in a new document is in the event handler for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼會將附加的事件處理常式， ，和上的事件。The following code attaches event handlers for the , , and events on . 此程式碼範例假設您的專案具有執行個體控制項，名為`WebBrowser1`。This code sample assumes your project has an instance of the control named `WebBrowser1`. [!code-cpp[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#1)]
